65:       def filter_by(constraint)
66:         all = []
67:         all_paths.each do |path|
68:           if path.send(constraint)
69:             paths  = path.paths
70:             paths -= path.children.values.map { |p| p.send(constraint) ? [] : p.paths }.flatten
71:             all.concat(paths)
72:           end
73:         end
